questions.questions: Have you been feeling down, depressed, or hopeless often in the past two weeks?
Have you lost interest or pleasure in doing things you normally enjoy?
Do you feel tired or have little energy nearly every day?
Do you feel bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down?
Do you have trouble concentrating on things, like reading the newspaper or watching television?
Do you feel nervous, anxious, or on edge nearly every day?
Are you unable to stop or control worrying?
Do you become easily annoyed or irritable?
Do you feel afraid as if something awful might happen?
Do you find it hard to focus on your work or daily activities?
Do you engage in activities that are risky or harmful to yourself or others?
Do you have any eating habits that concern you (like eating too much, too little, or purging)?
Do you have trouble sleeping, either too much or too little?
Do you feel isolated or disconnected from other people?
